org.mapdb

Class Volume.ByteBufferVolume

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mapdb.Volume
      • org.mapdb.Volume.ByteBufferVolume
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Volume.MappedFileVolume, Volume.MemoryVolume
    Enclosing class:
    Volume

    public abstract static class Volume.ByteBufferVolume
extends Volume
    Abstract Volume over bunch of ByteBuffers It leaves ByteBuffer details (allocation, disposal) on subclasses. Most methods are final for better performance (JIT compiler can inline those).

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.mapdb.Volume

        Volume.ByteBufferVolume, Volume.MappedFileVolume, Volume.MemoryVolume, Volume.RandomAccessFileVolume, Volume.VolumeFactory

      • Fields inherited from class org.mapdb.Volume

      • unmap

        public static final void unmap(MappedByteBuffer b)
        Hack to unmap MappedByteBuffer. Unmap is necessary on Windows, otherwise file is locked until JVM exits or BB is GCed. There is no public JVM API to unmap buffer, so this tries to use SUN proprietary API for unmap. Any error is silently ignored (for example SUN API does not exist on Android).
